bioconda.name: bioconductor-seqarray
bioconda.summary: Data Management of Large-Scale Whole-Genome Sequence Variant Calls

biotools.summary: Big data management of whole-genome sequencing variant calls with thousands of individuals: genotypic data (e.g., SNVs, indels and structural variation calls) and annotations in the corresponding files are stored in an array-oriented and compressed manner, with efficient data access using the R programming language.

bioschemas.name: SeqArray
bioschemas.summary: Big data management of whole-genome sequencing variant calls with thousands of individuals: genotypic data (e.g., SNVs, indels and structural variation calls) and annotations in the corresponding files are stored in an array-oriented and compressed manner, with efficient data access using the R programming language.
